citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 pm on
20-Feb-19.
Licensee was not at home but was contacted by phone and stated they were out of town and not able to return for
an inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 pm on
20-Feb-19.
Licensee was not at home but was contacted by phone and stated they were out of town and not able to return for
an inspection.
